title: Ethan Hawke on 'The Good Lord Bird' and His Journey As an Actor
description:
Chris and Andy are joined by Ethan Hawke to talk about choosing 'The Good Lord Bird' as his first foray into television (3:17) and becoming more involved in his projects and improving as an actor over the years (24:51).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Ethan Hawke
